abstract: Armenian Church files lawsuit in Turkish court seeking return of ancient headquarters that was seized by Ottoman Empire during Armenian Genocide of 1915-23; sees suit as 'first legal step' toward reclaiming all seized Armenian property.
lead_paragraph: Aram I of the Holy See of Cilicia said a historical divide would be deepened if the Turkish legal authorities rejected the lawsuit.

headline.main: Armenian Church Leader Speaks on Suit to Reclaim Seized Property
headline.print_headline: Armenian Church Leader Speaks on Suit to Reclaim Seized Property

snippet: Aram I of the Holy See of Cilicia said a historical divide would be deepened if the Turkish legal authorities rejected the lawsuit.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
